tweet.text: In 2004 President George W. Bush appointed Jendayi E. Frazer as the first female Ambassador to #SouthAfrica. In 2005 she was named Assistant Secretary of State for African Affairs. https://t.co/wIk6wnazKU #Twitterstorians #BlackHistoryMonth @JendayiFrazer @GWBLibrary https://t.co/LQ58eiHD42
tweet.html: In 2004 President George W. Bush appointed Jendayi E. Frazer as the first female Ambassador to #SouthAfrica.
